3. Signed by:- Palnadu District, Bollapalle Mandal, Garikapadu Suburb, Hanumapuram Village
॥ Vanikibai, wife of Desavathu Gopa Nayak, aged 44 years.-
Written by:- Gopa Nayak, son of Desavathu Musalayya Nayak, resident of Hanumapuram village, Garikapadu suburb, Bollapalli mandal, Palnadu district, aged 51 years.-
4. You are my wife. In return for my love for you, I consider it appropriate to transfer the immovable property as per the schedule below to you. I hereby declare that the immovable property as per the schedule below was acquired by my ancestors and after them, the rights were inherited by me as per the law of inheritance. I have constructed a R.C.C. slab terrace house with my own money and the Panchayat has registered my name in the tax records and has been donated to me till today. D. Gopa Nails13776

The Bed w
VINUKONDA The following schedule of the full possession enjoyment right is entered in the documents of the property of Rs. 9,46,000-00, which is worth nine lakhs and forty-six thousand rupees, and I have given you possession of the property on this day itself, free of charge, without consideration, and I have given you possession of the property on this day itself with all rights. From now on, you will pay the Panchayat taxes, etc. on the property, and you will enjoy it as you wish, with all full rights, including land, water, rocks, money, treasures, and deposits. If you enjoy it in this way, neither you, your heirs, nor your assigns, nor I, my heirs nor your assigns, nor anyone else, will be able to cause any kind of dispute in the future. If any dispute arises regarding the Scheduled Property, I will be able to avoid it at my own expense and pay this property to you without any delay. The Scheduled Property has not been previously encumbered by any other person, such as pledges, guarantees, mortgages in private and government institutions. The Scheduled Property and the relevant forms are to be filed with the Panchayat for registration of your name in their accounts. I agree to pay a penalty of three times the amount of the stamp duty payable under section 41A of the Indian Stamp (Andhra Pradesh Amendment) Act No. 16/2002 and sub-section (2) of section 70 of the Indian Stamp (Andhra Pradesh Amendment) Act, in case of non-payment of the due stamp duty due for concealment of the facts in the documents or for contravention of any provision of the Act. This property does not belong to the Government or its affiliated institutions. And there is no encumbrance or other encumbrance. This property is not an assignment by the Government under Act 9/77. I hereby declare to you that the Scheduled Estate is an undisputed and unalienable property and that there are no other heirs to the Scheduled Estate except me and that I have full rights to the Scheduled Estate. I will never be able to cancel or change this deed. This is my
written endorsement of the immovable property-

Office5. Schedule:- Palnadu D. Narsaraopet R.D. Vinukonda Sub D. Bollapalli Mandal, Hanumapuram
Garaikapadu Village Y.No.862-3, which is registered to you as a Gram Panchayat, is a 219-11 sq.m.
Area with a door no.5-38, assessment no.246, R.P.P. slab terrace house
Boundaries-
East:- A.8-0 wide road that I and my brother have left for commuting together.
West:- Desavathu Rupla Nayak's house.
North:- Desavathu Bala Nayak's house.
South:- Desavathu Jayaram Nayak's place.
The length between these boundaries is 58-0 x 34-0, measuring 219-11 sq.m. or 183-197 sq.m. The site has a 560-0 sq.m. R.C. slab patio built on pillars and walls 9 years ago and a 24-0 sq.m. ACC roofed latrine bathroom. All the special wooden furniture, doors, gates, electric fittings, electric meter, Panchayat tap connection, all the rights attached to the house are given to you and you are given possession of it. encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: GARIKAPADU/GARIKAPADU(0-0) W-B: 0-0 SURVEY: 862-3 HOUSE: 5-38 EXTE NT: 219.11SQ.Yds BUILT: 584SQ. FT Boundire s: [N]: DESAVATHU BALA NAIK HOUSE [S] D ESAVATHU JAYARAM NAIK SITE [E]: 8-0 FTS WIDE ROAD [W]: DESAVATHU RUPLA NAIK HOUSE

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 13776 of 2025, dated 05/Nov/2025, executed by Desavathu Gopa Naik in favour of his Wife, Dasavathu Naniki Bai towards the property admeasuring an extent of 219-11 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 5-38, Assessment number 246, comprised in survey number 862-3, situated in Garikapadu Village, Hanumapuram Grama Panchayath, Bollapalle Mandal, within the District of Palnadu, registered at sub-registrar office Vinukonda (730), is bounded as follows: North by: House of Desavathu Bala Naik South by: Site of Desavathu Jayaram Naik East by: 8-0 Fts., Wide Road West by: House of Desavathu Rupla Naik.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
